required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 10, 2017
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Phase IV Open Label Single Group One Year Study Of Home Self-Injection With Sayana (Registered) Press In Adult Women Of Reproductive Age

brief_summary.textblock: A one-year evaluation of Sayana Press self injection in women of reproductive age in the United Kingdom (UK).

primary_outcome.measure: the proportion of all attempted home self-injections that were successfully performed by the study participant at home (ie, not in the clinic under direct HCP supervision) and on schedule (13 week interval +/- 1 week).
primary_outcome.description: The primary endpoint will be the proportion of all attempted home self-injections that were successfully performed by the study participant at home (ie, not in the clinic under direct HCP supervision) and on schedule (13 week interval +/- 1 week). If a subject decides to discontinue Sayana Press as her contraceptive method, and therefore does not attempt one or more injections, these scheduled injections would not be included in the denominator for the primary endpoint

secondary_outcome.measure: continuation rate of Sayana Press over a one year period
secondary_outcome.description: continuation rate of Sayana Press for one year

intervention.description: Sayana Press in the Uniject injection system

link.description: To obtain contact information for a study center near you, click here.
